item.title: Rotate Animation in Swift
item.description: Updated on December 14, 2015 – Swift 2.0 + new examples With this post, I intend to wrap up my series on animations as UIView Extensions in Swift… for now.  Truthfully, these ideas flowed out of a real-world app that I was working on, which required various simple animations (fading in/out, sliding text, and now, rotating a view 360 degrees). Since I’ve given two other detailed walk-throughs on the topic, I’ll try to be to-the-point on this one.
